name: Darkness/Spell A
text:
Once per turn, this card cannot be destroyed by card effects. When this card is activated: Set 1 "Darkness/Trap A", "Darkness/Trap B", "Darkness/Trap C", "Darkness/Trap D" and "Darkness/Trap E" directly from your hand or Deck. The activation and effect of Continuous Traps you control cannot be negated.

-I activate "Darkness"!-

Hidden Effect
Once per turn: You can return all other Spells/Traps on the field to the hand.
